mapper.select: SELECT * FROM kdt_cust_info_basc ORDER BY cust_sn

choose.when: SELECT * FROM kdt_cust_info_basc WHERE cust_nm LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY cust_sn

mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ON (pic_sn_vl) pic_sn_vl, pic_nm, tkcg_dept_nm, pic_role, pic_telno FROM kdt_cust_info_basc;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kdt_cust_info_basc(cust_nm, pridtf_no, eml_addr, home_telno, mbl_telno, cr_nm, road_nm_addr) VALUES(#{cust_nm}, #{pridtf_no}, #{eml_addr}, #{home_telno}, #{mbl_telno}, #{cr_nm}, #{road_nm_addr})
mapper.update: UPDATE kdt_cust_info_basc SET cust_nm = #{customerDto.cust_nm}, pridtf_no = #{customerDto.pridtf_no}, eml_addr = #{customerDto.eml_addr}, home_telno = #{customerDto.home_telno}, mbl_telno = #{customerDto.mbl_telno}, cr_nm = #{customerDto.cr_nm}, road_nm_addr = #{customerDto.road_nm_addr}, last_mdfcn_dt = #{customerDto.last_mdfcn_dt} WHERE cust_sn = #{customerDto.cust_sn}
